name: Moth Runner
description:
You are a moth trapped in a scientist laboratory. The only exit is locked by bio-metrics and you'll need to shock it open by building up enough static electricity in your body. Bounce off of safe lamps or fly within a safe distance of lightning arcs to skim energy. Avoid traps that deal a varying amount of damage with features like dash or just left and right movement.

Controls:

- W: Dash

- A: Move left

- D: Move Right

- Left Mouse Button: Click through the menus

Thank you to Guan Yu for experiments done on moths. You inspired this
